managementAPIToken.description:
Your Management API token must be added to the request _Authorization_ header using the following format:

 `Authorization: Bearer YOUR_MANAGEMENT_API_KEY`

scopes.create:encrypted_keys: Create encrypted Keys for the Moesif secure proxy
scopes.create:dashboards: Create a new team dashboard that can be shared
scopes.update:companies: Update existing companies and associated company metadata
scopes.create:companies: Create new companies and associated company metadata
scopes.create:reports: Create a new report such as SmartDiff
scopes.create:workspaces: Create a new workspace/chart that can be shared
scopes.delete:encrypted_keys: Delete encrypted Keys for the Moesif secure proxy
scopes.read:events: Read/query events and associated event metadata
scopes.create:events: Create new events and associated event metadata
scopes.read:encrypted_keys: Read encrypted Keys for the Moesif secure proxy
scopes.update:encrypted_keys: Update encrypted Keys for the Moesif secure proxy
scopes.create:access_tokens: Create new tokens to access the Management API or Collector API
scopes.create:users: Create new users and associated user metadata
scopes.create:apps: Create a new application/project under the organization
scopes.read:users: Read/query users and associated user metadata
scopes.delete:reports: Delete existing reports such as SmartDiff
scopes.update:users: Update existing users and associated user metadata
scopes.read:companies: Read/query companies and associated company metadata
scopes.delete:companies: Delete existing companies and associated company metadata
scopes.delete:users: Delete existing users and associated user metadata

info.description: Management API to query data in Moesif. You can use the management API to export data for custom reports or to build custom dashboards.
info.title: Management API

parameters.name: delete_events
parameters.description: Delete events associated with the company which can be set to true or false(default)

get.summary: Get the Subscriptions of a Company

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start date, which can be absolute such as 2019-07-01T00:00:00Z or relative such as -24h

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end date, which can be absolute such as 2019-07-02T00:00:00Z or relative such as now
